profile.description: I am an enthusiast of the IT world. I'm very autodidact, with resolving capacity and with a lot of predisposition to learn.
profile.greeting: Hi, I'm Axel Ledesma - Frontend Developer

projects.first-project-description: It is an ecommerce of watches, both analogue, digital and smart watches.
projects.second-project-description: A movies and series page where you can to search for name and genre. Also you can to add to favorite. This page was made it with TheMovieDB api
projects.third-project-description: It's a real time chat wich you can to join entering a username and a id room. This project did it with socket.io in client side and in server side
